entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 near noon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
